name: NECROSIS: RECONFIGURATED
description:
NECROSIS : RECONFIGURATED is one Multiplayer FPS Game that brings the player a fast-paced movement and crazy graphics!
Unlock now 150 ranks with different weapons, skins, attachments and more types of items!
The game has unique resources like:

- good amount of gamemodes!
- huge variety of weapons!
- more than 10 maps!
- advanced BOT AI (on offline and online!)
- Community system of making maps! (Only on our discord right now.)

Discover this new fps experience with NECROSIS : RECONFIGURATED! Try now!
